thread.title: Toronto Blue Jays beat Texas Rangers 5-1 in ALDS Game 3: Live updates recap
thread.title_full: Toronto Blue Jays beat Texas Rangers 5-1 in ALDS Game 3: Live updates recap | OregonLive.com

author: JD Humburg | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Toronto Blue Jays beat Texas Rangers 5-1 in ALDS Game 3: Live updates recap
text:
UPDATE : The Blue Jays beat the Rangers 5-1 in Game 3. The Rangers still lead the best-of-five series 2-1. Game 4 is Monday in Texas.
***
The Toronto Blue Jays and Texas Rangers resume their best-of-five American League Division Series with Sunday's Game 3 in Texas. Here are the details:
What : Toronto Blue Jays at Texas Rangers in ALDS Game 3. Texas leads series 2-0.
Where : Globe Life Park in Arlington
When : Sunday, October 11, at 5:10 p.m. PT/8:10 p.m. ET
What TV channel : TV on Fox Sports 1, radio on KMTT (910 AM) in Portland area
Live updates : Follow along in the comments section below for live game updates
Watch and listen online : Watch online at Fox Sports Go . Listen at ESPNRadio.com .
Pitching matchup : Toronto's Marco Estrada (13-8, 3.13 ERA) vs. Texas' Martin Perez (3-6, 4.46 ERA)
Playoff schedule : Bookmark our MLB scoreboard for postseason scores and schedules.
